content: Apologies if this was mentioned somewhere else â€“ the Wiki Page says "kick-off at 4 PM". Which timezone is that? And what are the other dates & times, when approximately is wrap-up and presentations?
@Sandra Vance can you please clarify for @Pascal Pfiffner Thank you.
The kick off will be at 4:00 PM ET on Wednesday, September 9th. The Connectathon testing will take place on the 10th and 11th. Details will be posted to confluence soon.
I was unable to attend the Connectathon Info session on 1st September. Was the session recorded? Can i get a link for the recording.
@Mrigendra Kumar Here are the recording and the slides!

Question: the intro slides for the Connectathon mention a wrap-up call at 6:00 PM ET today, but I don't see anything in Whova. Is that session still on?
Edit: fixed time in case someone sees it wrong
@Gino Canessa I think it's at 6 ET based on the slide screen grab in the video above
And I hear it might be a sub under the updates schedule...
It is a sub session of the Track Highlights that starts at 6 ET
Is there a link available for the track report out? I updated the confluence page, but don't have a link to the doc. Thanks!
